meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Apurva Kanneganti Porter Bowman Lily Allingham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7398.

div.div:
2016 Teen Tournament quarterfinal game 1.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Apurva Kanneganti, a senior from Germantown, Tennessee
Porter Bowman, a junior from Darien, Connecticut
Lily Allingham, a sophomore from Wilmington, Delaware

tr.td: MONEY, MONEY, MONEY
3 CONSONANTS IN A ROW
POP CULTURE
DON'T YOU KNOW
THERE'S A WAR ON
(Alex: But which war?)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The name of this British monetary unit comes from a unit of weight')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The name of this British monetary unit comes from a unit of weight
